short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Intercepts the SAML assertion when logging into the AWS console and exchanges it for temporary STS credentials.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension exchanges the SAML assertion for temporary STS credentials when signing into the AWS console, the credentials are made available to copy and paste directly into your CLI, and can be copied in different formats depending on your operating system and CLI preferences.
